name: King's Quest 1: Quest for the Crown
name_original: King's Quest 1: Quest for the Crown
description:
King's Quest 1: Quest for the Crown is an adventure game developed by Sierra On-Line. It was originally released in 1990. Sierra On-Line published the game. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
You can play King's Quest 1: Quest for the Crown on Commodore / Amiga, Classic Macintosh, Apple II and SEGA Master System.
Roberta Williams produced the game. Roberta Williams directed the game.
